beginner.name: Box Breathing
beginner.benefits: Reduces stress, improves focus, perfect for beginners

intermediate.name: 4-7-8 Breathing
intermediate.benefits: Promotes sleep, reduces anxiety, calms nervous system

advanced.name: Coherent Breathing
advanced.benefits: Heart rate variability, emotional balance, deep calm

expert.name: Stimulating Breathwork
expert.benefits: Increases energy, cold tolerance, mental resilience
